body.p: The semantic search functionality requires that you configure to connect to OpenAI on your behalf.
In the Organization Profile page, you must configure an API key obtained from OpenAI to allow to connect to their API.

p.note: Please make sure that the key is specifically generated to be used only in .

body.p: Additionally, you can specify an optional OpenAI organization that will be used to track usage.

section.title: Generating an OpenAI API Key
section.p: You can generate a new secret API Key in the API keys page from your OpenAI user account.
